item.title: The Namespace Rabbit Hole
item.description: I’ve been working on an R package for factor analysis visualization for a while now, and ran into an interesting problem. One function in FAtools is essentially a wrapper for several functions in the nFactors package, which plots and displays both graphical and non graphical scree test solutions. It’s a handy way for people to look a little more closely at the number of factors to extract (although, I would argue not enough).
